thread.title: Salman Khan’s ‘Main Hoon Hero Tera’ crosses 5 mn views
thread.title_full: Salman Khan’s ‘Main Hoon Hero Tera’ crosses 5 mn views | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Salman Khan’s ‘Main Hoon Hero Tera’ crosses 5 mn views
text:
Other Articles Sugar, yes please! 5 reasons why it is added to foods No one thought I could carry off 'Aahalya', says Radhika Apte Oral drug to treat alcholism may be available in 5 years! Salman Khan ’s deep and soulful voice has once again mesmerised his fans as his latest song ‘Main Hoon Hero Tera’ has garnered more than 5 million views on YouTube.
The 49-year-old Salman Khan’s voice has not only connected well with the online audience but has also made the song top all the charts offline, making it a true chartbuster.
The ‘Dabangg’ star is sounding as good as a professional singer and he can totally give the current lot of singers a run for their money.
Produced by Khan and Subhash Ghai, ‘Hero’ stars Athiya Shetty and Sooraj Pancholi and will hit the theatres on September 11.
 19, 2015 9:58 am
